description.en: The Shukla-paksha Ekadashi of `vRzcikamAsa` is also celebrated as `kaizika-EkAdazI`. Kaisika Puranam, consisting of 82 shlokas describes the story of `ta:nampADuvAn2` and a `rAkSasa` who attained mukti by `nAmasaGkIrtanam` and the fruits of `ta:nampADuvAn`'s `nAmasaGkIrtanam`, respectively!
